item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 6:40 tonight, so let's meet outside (or right inside the doors of the theater if it's cold) at 6:15, then we'll head in to buy tix and get snacks, etc. See you tonight! And don't forget to RSVP if you haven't already.


OLD STUFF:
Let's try a period piece this time! What a way to start off a week! Just check out The Dutchess' summary:

A vibrant beauty and celebrity of her time is trapped in an unhappy triangle with her husband and his live-in mistress. She falls passionately in love with an ambitious young politician, and the affair causes a bitter conflict with her husband and threatens to erupt into a scandal.

Starring: Keira Knightley, Ralph Fiennes, Dominic Cooper, Hayley Atwell, Charlotte Rampling

Guests are always welcome, just include them in your RSVP.

Discounted tickets are $8.50 instead of $10. Exact change is appreciated, but not a big deal. Also, I have $3 small popcorn and $3 small soda vouchers for sale.

Hope to see you next Monday!

--Dana
item.name: The Dutchess
